segments.text: The system crashed when I was surfing on the internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you go to any illegal website ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , your computer can be easily infected by virus if you do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . I'd better never try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what's wrong with my PC ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One minute . Oh , yes , it was infected by a virus , and you had no antivirus software .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is anti-virus software necessary for a PC ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . You'd better learn something about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid yes . But what about the data I stored in the computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , it should have been protected automatically . And I take an anti-virus software with me . Do you want me to install it now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . I'll really appreciate that .
segments.speaker: S2
